channel.title: I need help with placing an npc
channel.description: I need help with placing an npc. The npc I want is a guard (::npc 9) I want him to say "Welcome to Mupescape v1" but I don't know how to do that I don't want people to be able to attack him and I want him to stay in once place without moving. I edited a pic to show where I want guard to be placed will. Will anyone help me with this. I would really appreciate for your guys help Thanks :) I would also like responses.Please people ignore the poll I know its usless but I can't post a thread without filling it out.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:50:44 AM[/size][hr]Someone please reply I know almost everyone knows how to do this kind of stuff.

item.title: I need help with placing an npc
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I need help with placing an npc. The npc I want is a guard (::npc 9) I want him to say “Welcome to Mupescape v1” but I don’t know how to do that I don’t want people to be able to attack him and I want him to stay in once place without moving. I edited a pic to show where I want guard to be placed will. Will anyone help me with this. I would really appreciate for your guys help Thanks I would also like responses.Please people ignore the poll I know its usless but I can’t post a thread without filling it out.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:50:44 AM[/size][hr]Someone please reply I know almost everyone knows how to do this kind of stuff.
